original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med ba bzhi dang gzugs med ba snyom ba jug ba bzhi dang rnam ba thar ba brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas ba snyom ba jug ba dgu dang rnam ba thar ba sgo stong ba nyid dang

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med ba dang smon ba med ba dang mngon ba shes ba lnga dang ting nge dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs ba stobs chu dang mi jigs ba bzhi dang so so yang dag ba rig ba bzhi dang

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: byams ba chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgya kyi chos ma dre ba chos brgyad dag kyang ston

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen po rnams kyi mngon ba shes ba dang rdzu phrul gyi rnam ba rtse ba dag kyang ston te

analyzed: sangs rgya kyi zhing nas sangs rgya kyi zhing du dong zhing dge ba rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgya joms ldan da de dag la rim gror byed ba dang bkur stir byed ba dang phu dud du byed ba dang mchod ba byed ba dod ba de lta bu dge ba
